NewsItem.HEADLINE: Cellular IoT Devices 2019 Forecast Update 1 (Excel File) with Research Notes (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A ten-year forecast for Cellular IoT devices, modules, and semiconductors.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: Details include breakdowns by technology (LTE-M, NB-IoT, 2G, 3G, Cat-4, Cat-1, etc), as well as breakdowns by appication. Revenue estimates at multiple levels of the market include services revenue, device revenue, module revenue, and semiconductor revenue through 2029. Market shares for key module suppliers and chip suppliers are included for 2018.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: Cellular IoT CIOT C-IoT IoT market forecast NB-IoT Cat-NB LTE-M Cat-M LoRa
